sub_title: Former Acting Dean of the College of Humanities and International Studies at University of the Nations; on sabbatical
summary:
Worked with drug addicts at the Grapevine Shelter in Seattle, WA, USA from 1971-1978.
Librarian 1980-1995
Training Director at Youth With A Mission, Heidebeek, the Netherlands, 1985-1995; 2000-2009.
Acting Dean College of Humanities and International Studies 2003-2017.
Resource Teacher in U of N schools.

Specialties: History of Western Ideas
World History
Epistemology
Biblical Worldview
World religions and worldviews
History and theology of worship
